Government Whip Mark Gerretsen confirmed that a seat has been reserved for d'Entremont in the House, specifically in the Liberal class of 2019. The Liberals have not disclosed whether they are pursuing additional floor-crossers. The Conservatives, while denying rumors of further defections, have been avoiding media and using back doors to enter caucus meetings.
